name: Mother and child
description: I would like to use the 100HEN action range also for a statement.  This picture of mother and child was taken in a zoo.  Every time I visit the zoo, I get sad and struggle with myself that these animals can not live in peace in freedom.  Zoos are often and much criticized - but the real criticism we deserve ourselves.  A zoo, a park, a reserve would not be necessary if we were able to deal with our planet in a decent way, to treat flora and fauna with respect and to grant creatures that are so similar to us in many ways the living space they deserve. Let us all - everyone in front of his own door and everyone who wants it with others united do something for this planet. So that the next generation may experience nature not only from books.
